title: Bloomberg Markets: Cox on Bannon Out, Cohn to Stay With Trump
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cox on Bannon Out, Cohn to Stay With Trump
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jamie Cox Managing Partner Harris Financial Group Discussing how the markets see National Economic Council Director Gary Cohn as the key to the Trump agenda on business, taxes, and trade.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
